backend/main.mo: Defines a Motoko actor with extensive Mood and Gender variants and helpers, laying groundwork for user mood handling and text conversion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report listing a UI change to hide relationship intent in the Circle Members list and its affected file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing recent UI, routing, and logic changes across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light/dark theme variables and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint injecting the root div and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router, React Query, theming, and authenticated/public route trees for the entire React app.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: App header with theme toggle, journal button, user menu, and logout behavior that clears identity and cache.
frontend/src/components/app/AppLayout.ts: Authenticated app layout wrapping header, bottom nav, journal overlay, and logout-redirect logic.
frontend/src/components/app/BottomNav.ts: Bottom navigation bar with icon-first buttons and unread notification badges using safe-area padding.
frontend/src/components/app/FloatingJour: Floating action button that opens the compose page when visible.
frontend/src/components/app/ThemeToggleB: Toggle button switching between light and dark modes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wraps children with an auth check, showing a loading screen or login panel until Internet Identity is ready.
Displays the login UI with randomized copy, error handling, and Internet Identity login triggers.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleEne: Generates and displays a summary of circle activity using provided posts.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleMem: Shows circle members with profile data, pulse scores, and controls for removing members.
frontend/src/components/circle/JoinByCod: Form to submit a share code for joining a circle, with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/circle/PendingRe: Lists incoming join requests with profile details and allows accepting or declining them.
frontend/src/components/circle/SafePeopl: Manages selection of up to two safe people, including recommendations and toggle logic.
frontend/src/components/circle/ShareCode: Displays and allows editing of the user's share code, including copy and update actions.
frontend/src/components/common/IconActio: Wrapper around a Button that shows an icon and label with a tooltip, forwarding refs and props.
frontend/src/components/common/Progressi: Collapsible section component with a button trigger and animated chevron for expanding content.
frontend/src/components/feed/MoodCheckIn: Displays a reminder card prompting users to complete a mood check-in, with dismiss and navigate actions.
frontend/src/components/feed/SilentSigna: Renders a silent signal post with mood styling, author info, and timestamp, indicating if it’s the user's own.
Allows users to send predefined silent signals to safe people, handling setup checks and async submission.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalD: Popover calendar control for selecting a journal date, preventing future dates.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Manages viewing, creating, and deleting journal entries for a selected date with editable‑today rules.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalO: Right‑side sheet showing journal UI with rules, date picker, and entries panel.
frontend/src/components/profile/MicroAct: Generates and displays micro‑action suggestions based on mood history, with fallback when data is insufficient.
frontend/src/components/profile/MoodAnal: Displays mood pattern analysis over a selectable timeframe, showing trends, top moods, concern levels, and micro‑actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Provides avatar selection and upload functionality with validation, preview handling, and system avatar support.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Gates app content based on profile load status, showing setup, errors, or children depending on query results.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Guides new users through a multi‑step onboarding flow to create and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/sound/SoundEffec: Listens for new notifications, feed items, join requests, and circle member changes to trigger sound effects.
frontend/src/components/status/AudienceS: Lets users choose who can see a post, including circle-wide, specific people, safe people, or private options.
frontend/src/components/status/ContextTa: UI component for selecting predefined or custom context tags with validation and soft limits.
frontend/src/components/status/MoodPicke: Mood selection UI with search, category grouping, and emoji-based mood buttons.
frontend/src/components/status/PostStatu: Dialog prompting users to write a private note and showing optional micro‑action suggestions.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCar: Renders a user's mood status card with author info, mood styling, timestamp, and privacy indicators.
frontend/src/constants/contextTags.ts: Lists predefined context tags and configuration limits for custom tags.
frontend/src/constants/foundationCopy.ts: Provides core app promise and boundary text.
frontend/src/constants/loginCopy.ts: Contains login screen text variants and a helper for random phrase selection.
frontend/src/constants/moods.ts: Defines mood options with labels, emojis, and categories used across mood‑related UI.
frontend/src/constants/sounds.ts: Defines paths for notification and activity sound assets.
frontend/src/constants/systemAvatars.ts: Lists system avatar metadata and provides lookup by ID.
frontend/src/contexts/FloatingJournalVis: Context controlling visibility of the floating journal UI.
frontend/src/contexts/JournalOverlayCont: Context managing the open state and reset behavior of the journal overlay.
frontend/src/contexts/SoundContext.tsx: Provides global sound settings and playback utilities, handling audio unlocking and user preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor to expose error state and refetch behavior for actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login/logout flow, and provides identity via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Provides hooks to query, create/update, and delete journal entries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodHistory.ts: Builds a filtered, chronological mood history for the current user based on recent feed items.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains profile, avatar, feed, and notification query/mutation hooks backed by the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSound.ts: Re-exports the sound context hook for easy access.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS config with color themes, dark mode variables, and safe-area utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CirclePage.tsx: Circle page with tabs for members, requests, join options, and safe people, plus energy card and filtered status posts.
frontend/src/pages/CirclesImInPage.tsx: Shows circles the user belongs to, with loading, error, and empty states, rendering owners with avatars.
frontend/src/pages/ClosestConnectionsPag: Displays ranked closest connections with avatars and details, handling loading, errors, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ComposeStatusPage.tsx: Status composer allowing mood selection, content entry, audience selection, and posting with validation.
frontend/src/pages/DailyCheckInPage.tsx: Daily check‑in flow similar to status compose, gated by reminder guard and mood history logic.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Main feed showing status updates, silent signals, reminders, and refresh actions with empty and loading views.
frontend/src/pages/HomeRoutePage.tsx: Home route deciding between public home, loading screen, or authenticated feed inside layout and profile gate.
frontend/src/pages/InviteCodeAuthStepPag: Handles invite-code-based login flow, auto-joining a circle after Internet Identity authentication and managing stored invite codes.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays unread and read notifications, supports marking items or all as read, and navigates to related status pages.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits user profile details including avatar, preferences, and age visibility, with save and cancel workflows.
frontend/src/pages/PublicHomePage.tsx: Public landing page allowing users to enter an invite code or start account creation, with basic feature descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/StartAuthPage.tsx: Initiates Internet Identity login for account creation or sign-in and redirects to the app after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/StatusDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays a single status post, handling permission and not‑found errors with fallback messaging.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Utility functions for calculating age, formatting birthdates, and converting date inputs to bigint timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/audience.ts: Builds a unique Principal audience list for a post, always including the author.
frontend/src/utils/circleEnergy.ts: Analyzes recent posts to derive a weekly vibe and generates a non-clinical summary sentence.
frontend/src/utils/contextTags.ts: Normalizes and validates custom context tags, checking length and duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCheckInEntry.ts: Manages a sessionStorage guard flag for one-time daily check-in entry flow.
frontend/src/utils/inviteCodeSession.ts: Stores, normalizes, retrieves, and clears invite codes in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/microActions.ts: Provides a micro‑action library and rule engine to suggest brief supportive actions based on mood history and tags.
frontend/src/utils/moodAnalysis.ts: Computes mood distribution, trends, concern levels, and guidance with a non-clinical disclaimer.
frontend/src/utils/moodColors.ts: Maps mood categories to Tailwind color and gradient class sets for UI styling.
frontend/src/utils/moodReminder.ts: Handles daily mood‑check reminder dismissal using localStorage keyed by date.
frontend/src/utils/profileAvatar.ts: Resolves avatar sources, validates uploads, converts files to bytes, and handles blob URL cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/shareCode.ts: Generates a 6‑character uppercase alphanumeric share code without ambiguous characters.
frontend/src/utils/soundPreferences.ts: Gets and sets a boolean sound‑enabled preference in localStorage with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Converts between backend time and JS Date and provides date utilities like day boundaries and formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, plugins, content paths, and an extended theme including colors, radius, shadows, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, architecture notes, and known issues related to frontend, backend, routing, storage, and feature rollout.
